title: League of legends client keeps  crashing!
body: Why is  this happening? It started right after the new update for league and then when I  tried to start up a game  (prepare for battle) the game wouldn't even get to the champ loading screen where you see the champs percent and then it would crash and tell me to reconnect and I would and it would just do the same  thing over and over and over again. Anyone have any suggestions so  they are greatly appreciated{{champion:420}}

replies.body: Same thing happened to me yesterday, however I was able to reconnect pretty fast (mind you, this was a custom 2v2 with friends on ARAM).
